version_description: Warn iOS 7 users when magicJack app does not have permission to use the microphone.
- Bug fixes
Enhanced voice quality on iOS 7

- Bug fixes
- General performance improvements

- Get a second line for your iPhone, iPad, or iPod
- We've added text messaging to/from any U.S. mobile number
- New with single sign-on
- We've added in-app purchase
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes

- Now with single sign-on
- Bug fixes
- bug fixes

- Call notification improvements
- Bug fixes
IPv6 and iOS 11 support

NEW VERSION 5.0

We’ve made some performance enhancements, bug fixes and improvements to magicApp! Here’s what changed with this update:

* Supports the latest technology changes to iOS
* Faster and more responsive user interface
* Better voice quality
* Receive calls without unlocking your phone

* Allows access to messages/call history/contacts during a call
* Fixes an issue with connectivity over cellular networks
* Has better messaging for expired/invalid subscriptions & call failures.
* Is more resilient to patchy network conditions.
* Starts up faster and allows interaction immediately
* Fixes an issue with accessing contacts in the messages view
* Fixes an issue with displaying anonymous missed calls
* Fixes an issue with updating international calling minutes balance

* Fixes an issue with calls going to voicemail for users with expired premium numbers
* Makes it easier to select real phone numbers
* Fixes corruption of call logs
* Remembers and defaults to last used subscription & phone number on a device

* Will ask for microphone permissions at startup, if required.
* Would not say "No internet connection" when network is available
* Fixes crashes and has other stability improvements.

* Has better in-app purchase experience
* Fixes an issue with attaching/detaching bluetooth accessories
* Highlights links and phone numbers in messages
* Has other bug fixes and usability improvements.

* Fixes an issue with backing up & restoring call logs
* Marks declined & missed calls differently in the UI
* Fixes an issue with handling incoming text messages
* Has other fixes and stability improvements

* Fixes an issue with adding missed call entries to call logs
* Makes it easier for users to report problems
* Allows users to customize the app's ringtone
* Allows users to change the Contacts' sort criteria
* Has other bug fixes and stability improvements

* Fixes an issue with adding missed call entries to call logs
* Makes it easier for users to report problems
* Allows users to customize the app's ringtone
* Allows users to change the Contacts' sort criteria
* Has other bug fixes and stability improvements
* Bug fixes and stability improvements
* Bug fixes and stability improvements

* View and Switch between your subscriptions and numbers in the app.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements
* Bug fixes & stability improvements
* Bug fixes & stability improvements

* Fixes the mute button in call window
* International minute purchases reflect immediately on iOS14
Allows users with eligible subscriptions to re-enable magicJack's SMS Service
* Create a new magicJack account and purchase a monthly subscription for calls/SMS to landlines & mobiles. Free US phone number included.

* Handles interrupted & previously failed signups correctly
* Can make & receive calls right after signup
* Other behind-the-scenes bug fixes & stability improvements
* Fixes an issue with subscription purchases with delayed payments
Provides options to upgrade from unsupported subscriptions
